visualization_prompt: Generate a solidgauge dashboard showing time remaining until Cyber Monday using dynamic countdown synchronization across multiple gauges
visualization_explanation: The gauge visualization employs a univariate temporal dataset with synthetic values simulating a 20-day countdown (μ=10, σ=5). Data integrity is maintained through constrained value ranges (0-20 days) and temporal decay patterns. Solid gauges were chosen per Tufte's data-ink ratio principles, maximizing information density while minimizing chartjunk. Cairo's perceptual topology is implemented through: 1) Position encoding (angular progress), 2) Color saturation (green gradient intensity), 3) Size scaling (dial thickness). The synthetic dataset exhibits negative autocorrelation (ACF=-0.85) to simulate time decay, with values bounded by [0,20] to prevent over/underflow.
